txt.en: Agorin asked you to launch an assault upon the summit of Minas Gîl, where some powerful sorcery appears to be underway. Upon your arrival, you have discovered a band of sorcerers led by the Black Númenórean Gúlbenn in the midst of an evil ritual of shadows.
Defeated Gúlbenn, the sorcerer of Minas Gîl
Defeat Gúlbenn, the sorcerer of Minas Gîl
Defeat the sorcerer Gúlbenn and his servants atop Minas Gîl.
You were too late to prevent the summoning of a powerful Spirit of Shadow. You must defeat it!
